mapper.select: SELECT a.* ,b.* ,c.* from classOrder a left join member b on b.seq = a.member_seq left join transport c on a.member_seq = c.member_seq AND c.tOrder = 1 left join classProduct d on d.seq = a.classProduct_seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT a.* ,b.* from member a left join transport b on b.member_seq = a.seq AND b.tOrder = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{mSeq}

SELECT a.* ,b.type ,b.sort ,b.originalName ,b.uuidName ,b.ext ,b.pseq ,b.path ,c.category ,c.title ,d.name ,d.id ,d.phone ,d.email ,e.zipcode ,e.address ,e.addressDetail ,e.addr3 FROM classOrder a left join productUploaded b on b.pseq = a.classProduct_seq left join classProduct c on c.seq = a.classProduct_seq left join member d on d.seq = a.member_seq left join transport e on e.member_seq = a.member_seq WHERE b.sort = 1 AND a.member_seq = #{mSeq} AND a.seq = #{seq}

SELECT a.* ,c.category ,c.title ,d.name ,d.phone ,d.email FROM classOrder a left join classProduct c on c.seq = a.classProduct_seq left join member d on d.seq = a.member_seq WHERE a.member_seq = #{mSeq} AND a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT a.* ,b.* FROM productUploaded a left join classProduct b on b.seq = a.pseq WHERE a.pseq = #{seq} AND a.sort = 1

SELECT a.seq ,a.classProduct_seq as pdSeq ,a.member_seq as mSeq ,a.orderDate ,b.type ,b.sort ,b.originalName ,b.uuidName ,b.ext ,b.pseq ,b.path ,c.category ,c.title FROM classOrder a left join productUploaded b on b.pseq = a.classProduct_seq left join classProduct c on c.seq = a.classProduct_seq left join member d on d.seq = a.member_seq WHERE b.sort = 1 AND a.member_seq = #{mSeq}
